item.text: From Paul, a slave of God and apostle of Jesus Christ, to further the faith of God’s chosen ones and the knowledge of the truth that is in keeping with godliness,

<st data-num="1909" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st> of <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, who does <st data-num="893" class="">not lie</st>, <st data-num="1861" class="">promised</st> <st data-num="4253" class="">before</st> <st data-num="5550">time</st> <st data-num="166">began</st>.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> now in <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">time</st><n id="1" /> he has <st data-num="5319" class="">made</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> <st data-num="5319" class="">evident</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">through</st> the <st data-num="2782" class="">preaching</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> was <st data-num="4100" class="">entrusted</st> <st data-num="2596">with according to</st> the <st data-num="2003" class="">command</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="4990" class="">Savior</st>.
To Titus, my genuine son in a common faith. Grace and peace from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Savior!
The reason I left you in Crete was to set in order the remaining matters and to appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

An elder must <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="410" class="">blameless</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="435" class="">husband</st> of <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> <st data-num="1135" class="">wife</st>,<n id="2" /> with <st data-num="4103" class="">faithful</st> <st data-num="5043" class="">children</st><n id="3" /> who <st data-num="3361" class="">cannot</st> be <st data-num="2724" class="">charged</st> with <st data-num="810" class="">dissipation</st> <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="506" class="">rebellion</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="1985" class="">overseer</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1163">must</st> <st data-num="1510">be</st> <st data-num="410" class="">blameless</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> one entrusted with <st data-num="2316" class="">God’s</st> <st data-num="3623" class="">work</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="829" class="">arrogant</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3711">prone to anger</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> a <st data-num="3943" class="">drunkard</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4131" class="">violent</st>, <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="146">greedy for gain</st>.

<st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st> he must be <st data-num="5382" class="">hospitable</st>, <st data-num="5358">devoted to what is good</st>, <st data-num="4998" class="">sensible</st>, <st data-num="1342" class="">upright</st>, <st data-num="3741" class="">devout</st>, and <st data-num="1468" class="">self-controlled</st>.
He must hold firmly to the faithful message as it has been taught, so that he will be able to give exhortation in such healthy teaching and correct those who speak against it.
For there are many rebellious people, idle talkers, and deceivers, especially those with Jewish connections,

<st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">must</st> be <st data-num="1993" class="">silenced</st> because <st data-num="3748">they</st> <st data-num="396" class="">mislead</st> <st data-num="3650" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">families</st> by <st data-num="1321" class="">teaching</st> for <st data-num="150" class="">dishonest</st> <st data-num="2771" class="">gain</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> <st data-num="1163" class="">ought</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> to be taught.

A <st data-num="5100">certain one</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, in fact, one of <st data-num="2398" class="">their own</st> <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="2912" class="">Cretans</st> are <st data-num="104" class="">always</st> <st data-num="5583" class="">liars</st>, <st data-num="2556" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2342" class="">beasts</st>, <st data-num="692" class="">lazy</st> <st data-num="1064" class="">gluttons</st>.”<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3778" class="">Such</st> <st data-num="3141" class="">testimony</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="227" class="">true</st>. <st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3739">this</st> <st data-num="156" class="">reason</st> <st data-num="1651" class="">rebuke</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="664" class="">sharply</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> they may be <st data-num="5198" class="">healthy</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>

and <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4337">pay attention to</st> <st data-num="2451" class="">Jewish</st> <st data-num="3454" class="">myths</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1785" class="">commands</st> of <st data-num="444" class="">people</st> who <st data-num="654" class="">reject</st> the <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.

<st data-num="3956" class="">All</st> is <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st> to those who are <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st>. <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> to those who are <st data-num="3392" class="">corrupt</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="571" class="">unbelieving</st>, <st data-num="3762" class="">nothing</st> is <st data-num="2513" class="">pure</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">both</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3563" class="">minds</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">consciences</st> are <st data-num="3392" class="">corrupted</st>.
They profess to know God but with their deeds they deny him, since they are detestable, disobedient, and unfit for any good deed.
